1005870.name: HYPERFIGHT
1005870.description:
HYPERFIGHT is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. You'll have to risk your points to gain access to your character's special and super moves, which can turn the tide of the game in a heartbeat. Designed to be easy to pick up and hard to master, so grab a friend, any friend!

Featuring:
  • 7 (+1 unlockable) characters to master, with unique movesets
  • Online multiplayer lobbies with up to 8 players
  • Local versus, against player and CPU opponents
  • Single player Arcade Mode, Training Mode, and Tutorial
  • Full controller support, with rebindable controls
1005870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
